title: Just like you
creator_credit: Fran Haarsma, Fran Haarsma Productions and Ideas That Work
brief_description: Just like you is a comprehensive guide for people who are unsure of how to act around people with disabilities. The program answers questions such as, can you say “look” to a person who is blind? Do you offer to push someone in a wheelchair? Presented by people with disabilities, we are shown the preferred etiquette that can make interaction easier for both parties.
